feels.name: Excitement
feels.quote: Mr. Trumbull was enjoying the utmost activity of his great faculties.

feels.name: Defiance
feels.quote: Will was in a defiant mood, his consciousness being deeply stung with the thought that the people who looked at him probably knew a fact tantamount to an accusation against him.

feels.name: Relief
feels.quote: At length the 'Supper at Emmaus' was brought forward, to Will's immense relief.
